title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the DroneDeliveryHub system, including functional and non-functional requirements, stakeholder needs, system constraints, regulatory compliance, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DroneDeliveryHub system, including components, modules, and their interactions.

title: Develop Route Optimization Algorithm
description: Implement an algorithm to optimize delivery routes for drones, considering factors such as package weight, drone battery life, and air traffic.

title: Implement Air Traffic Management
description: Develop a system to manage air traffic for drones, ensuring safe and efficient flight paths and avoiding collisions.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for customers to place orders, track deliveries, and manage their accounts.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as encryption, authentication, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the DroneDeliveryHub system.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, API specifications, and user guides for the DroneDeliveryHub system.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement a database schema and data storage solution for the DroneDeliveryHub system.
